fn.p: Funding. This research was funded by a European Union project titled “Addressing the challenges of climate change for sustainable food security in Turkey, Iran, and Morocco, through the creation and dissemination of an international database to promote the use of wheat genetic resources and increase genetic gains,” CFP 2014/2015-W3B-PR-18-Turkey. Additional funds were received from CGIAR Research Program (CRP) WHEAT. CERCA Programme/Generalitat de Catalunya is also acknowledged.
